description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 17 November 2022 (RN: 22/01030/FULL) for alterations to main entrance on Chichester Street to provide double height glazed entrance lobby; extensions to amenity block to provide physical connections between the internal and external amenity spaces and improve accessibility to the Spanish/Moroccan Gardens; replacement, rationalised and consolidated plant, installation of new air source heat pump vent enclosures, rejuvenation of landscaped gardens, and necessary enabling works. Namely, revised design to the Spanish Garden and alterations to the physical connections between the internal and external amenity spaces to improve accessibility to the Spanish Garden.
